value.title: DeepMind makes bet on AI system that can play poker, chess, Go, and more
value.excerpt: Alphabet-backed DeepMind developed a system, called Player of Games, that can win at both imperfect and perfect information games.

value.title: AWS Deep Learning AMIs: New framework-specific DLAMIs for production complement the original multi-framework DLAMIs

value.title: The U.K.’s new AI transparency standard is a step closer to accountable AI
value.excerpt: The UK Government launched a new algorithmic transparency standard last week. Here's what it means for people and society.

value.title: Clinical text mining using the Amazon Comprehend Medical new SNOMED CT API
value.excerpt: Mining medical concepts from written clinical text, such as patient encounters, plays an important role in clinical analytics and decision-making applications, such as population analytics for providers, pre-authorization for payers, and adverse-event detection for pharma companies. value.title: New Windows 11 build tests Voice Access, Spotlight backgrounds
value.excerpt: Microsoft's Windows 11 Insider Build 22518 adds Voice Access for controlling your PC with your voice. Plus a new "Spotlight" background feature has been added, and Widgets has been reworked.

value.title: The Trevor Project has a new AI persona for LGBTQ crisis counseling
value.excerpt: Since the start of 2021, The Trevor Project, the largest suicide prevention organization for LGBTQ young people, has used an AI technology called the Crisis Contact Simulator to train its counselors on how to talk to youth in crisis.

value.title: Unlocking human rights information with machine learning
value.excerpt: Human rights defenders need information from many sources to do their work effectively. value.title: Zuckerberg And Chan Pledge $500 Million Of Their Facebook Fortune To Create An AI Institute At Harvard
value.excerpt: Zuckerberg and Chan, who met at a Harvard fraternity party in 2003, have already given $42 million to Harvard.

value.title: Those Sordid Follow-Home Robberies To First Rise And Then Thankfully Decline During The Coming Era Of AI Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: Follow-home robberies are in the news quite a bit. For the coming era of AI self-driving cars, such criminal acts will at first be emboldened and then later be generally overcome as driverless cars become widespread.

value.title: AI Video Platform Synthesia Raises $50 Million In Series B
value.excerpt: AI video platform Synthesia (cofounded by Under 30 honorees) which allows users to quickly make videos using software as opposed to using traditional video production equipment, announced today that it has raised $50 million in a Series B round led by Kleiner Perkins.

value.title: Moderna Stock Is Sold by This Robot Trader. It Bought Tesla and Merck Instead.
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence-run fund AMOM also loaded up on shares of Netflix, and bet big on a very low-profile medical device specialist.

value.title: Red Hat brings Ansible IT automation engine to Azure
value.excerpt: Red Hat is bringing the Ansible Automation Platform to Microsoft's Azure, helping companies manage and scale their IT environments.

value.title: The Era Of ‘Pervasive AI’ Has Begun: Get Going Or Get Left Behind
value.excerpt: This new era of AI — "pervasive AI" — marks the end of technology paralysis and the beginning of transformation enablement. So, no more excuses. Stop worrying about how AI works and start focusing on what you want it to do for your business.

value.title: Waymo's slow-going in Arizona opens up U.S. robotaxi race
value.excerpt: Alphabet Inc's Waymo risks losing its lead in the U.S. race to prove robotaxis are a viable business as it sticks to a limited service and rivals backed by automakers near their own launches.

value.title: Qualcomm's AI chip chief departs to take helm at startup MemryX
value.excerpt: Keith Kressin, the executive who oversaw Qualcomm Inc's artificial intelligence chip efforts, has left to take the top job at a Michigan-based semiconductor startup.

value.title: UK government sets out AI standards roadmap
value.excerpt: The UK’s Centre for Data Ethics and Innovation (CDEI) has published a roadmap for building an “assurance ecosystem” for artificial intelligence (AI).

value.title: AI Trends 2022: Spare Us The Hype, We Want Business Results
value.excerpt: The latest industry analyst predictions about artificial intelligence (AI) are out, and they’re certain to oust a ton of assumptions we’ve made to date.
